activities: Users of the MissionMode web-based application enter their own personal information for use by their own organization to send them messages via phone, email, fax, pager, and SMS.  Users control the visibility of their own personal information, and it is only used within the control of the organization that sponsors and pays for their user ID.  Personal information is never used by MissionMode except for troubleshooting purposes, and is never given to third parties.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Any controversy or claim arising out of or relating to this Policy shall be determined by arbitration administered by the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs), or by the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
